com.percussion.util
Class PSXMLDomUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.util.PSXMLDomUtil

public class PSXMLDomUtil
extends Object

Helper class to facilitate common XML tasks. That is available to clients (rxclient.jar).

PSXMLDomUtil

public PSXMLDomUtil()
Method Detail

getFirstElementChild

public static Element getFirstElementChild(Node node)
Static helper function to retrieve the first child element of type Node.ELEMENT_NODE. The standard DOM supports getFirstChild() but does not allow for the type checking.

Parameters:
node - the node to start from, must not be null
Returns:
the first element child of the supplied node, or null if none were found

getFirstElementChild

public static Element getFirstElementChild(Node node,
                                           String name)
                                    throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Static helper function to retrieve the first child element of type Node.ELEMENT_NODE and check it against the supplied name, if it is not the name, then throw an error. The standard DOM supports getFirstChild() but does not allow for the type checking.

Parameters:
node - the node to start from, must not be null
name - the name of the node to check against, must not be null or empty, is compared to this name case sensitive
Returns:
the first element child of the supplied node compared case, never null.
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException - if a node was not found, or the name does not match the found node

getNextElementSibling

public static Element getNextElementSibling(Node node)
Static helper function to retrieve only the Node.ELEMENT_NODE type sibling based from the specified node. The standard DOM supports getNextSibling(), but does not allow for node type checking.

Parameters:
node - the specified node to start from, must not be null
Returns:
the next sibling element as an Element, or null if there is no sibling of the supplied node

getNextElementSibling

public static Element getNextElementSibling(Node node,
                                            String name)
                                     throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Static helper function to retrieve only the Node.ELEMENT_NODE type sibling based from the specified node. The standard DOM supports getNextSibling(), but does not allow for node type checking. This routine also checks if the next element sibling is a specified named node.

Parameters:
node - the specified node to start from, must not be null
name - the name to check the node against to be sure the sibling is the one expected, must not be null or empty
Returns:
the next sibling element as an Element, or null if there is no sibling of the supplied node and compared with name case sensitive,
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
See Also:
for more info

getElementData

public static String getElementData(Node node)
Static helper function to get the element data of the specified node.

Parameters:
node - the Node where the text data resides, may be null in which case this funtion will return ""
Returns:
the complete text of the specified node or empty string if the node has no text or is null

checkNode

public static void checkNode(Element el,
                             String name)
                      throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Static helper method to check a specific node for existance based on a node name.

Parameters:
el - the specific node to test, may be null
name - the name of the node we are checking against, it does a case sensitive compare, must not be null or empty
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException - if the node is null or is not the node we are checking for

checkAttribute

public static String checkAttribute(Element el,
                                    String name,
                                    boolean required)
                             throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Static helper method to check an attribute of a specific element.

Parameters:
el - the element to get the attribute from, must not be null
name - the name of the attribute to retrieve, must not be null or empty
required - a boolean flag to determine if we throw an error if it does not exist or just return blank, if true, we throw an error, otherwise we just return "" if not found
Returns:
the value of the specified attribute or blank if not found and not required
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException - if the attribute was not found and was required

checkAttributeInt

public static int checkAttributeInt(Element el,
                                    String name,
                                    boolean required)
                             throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException,
                                    NumberFormatException
Static helper method to check an attribute of a specific element and returns an integer of that value.

Parameters:
el - the element to get the attribute from, must not be null
name - the name of the attribute to retrieve, must not be null or empty
required - a boolean flag to determine if we throw an error if it does not exist or just return -1, if true, we throw an error, otherwise we just return -1 if not found
Returns:
the value of the specified attribute or -1 if not found and not required
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException - if the attribute was not found and was required
NumberFormatException - if the value does not contain a parsable integer

checkAttributeBool

public static boolean checkAttributeBool(Element el,
                                         String name)
Convenience method that calls checkAttributeBool(el, name, true, "yes").

checkAttributeBool

public static boolean checkAttributeBool(Element el,
                                         String name,
                                         boolean defaultValue,
                                         String yesValue)
Static helper method to check an attribute of a specific element for a true/false flag.

Parameters:
el - the element to get the attribute from, must not be null
name - the name of the attribute to retrieve, must not be null or empty
defaultValue - If the attribute is not present or has no value, this value will be returned.
yesValue - If the attribute has a non-empty value, it is compared against this case-insensitive. If it matches, true is returned. If null or empty, 'yes' is used.
Returns:
true if the attributes value is present and matches the yesValue, otherwise the supplied defaultValue is returned.

checkAttributeLong

public static long checkAttributeLong(Element el,
                                      String name,
                                      boolean required)
                               throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException,
                                      NumberFormatException
Just like checkAttributeInt(Element, String, boolean), except this method will return a long.

Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
NumberFormatException

checkAttributeDate

public static Date checkAttributeDate(Element el,
                                      String name,
                                      boolean required)
                               throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException,
                                      NumberFormatException
Just like checkAttributeInt(Element, String, boolean), except this method will return a Date.

Returns:
a date or null if the value is empty
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
NumberFormatException

checkAttributeEnumerated

public static int checkAttributeEnumerated(Element el,
                                           String attrName,
                                           String[] legalValues,
                                           boolean required)
                                    throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Gets the element data from an attribute and validates that the data is a legal value, returning the index of that value into the supplied array of values.

Parameters:
el - the element to get the attribute from, must not be null
attrName - the name of the attribute to retrieve data from; not null, or empty.
legalValues - the array of permitted values, not null, with a default value at index 0 (must have at least one value).
required - true to throw an exception if the attribute is not found or has no data, false to return 0 in this case.
Returns:
The index into the supplied array that matches the attribute value. If the data is null or empty, index 0 of the legal value array is returned.
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException - if the node is found and has an illegal value, regardless of if it is required. If required and not found, then this exception is thrown as well.

getAttributeTrimmed

public static String getAttributeTrimmed(Element source,
                                         String name)
Gets the trimmed value of the attribute.

Parameters:
source - The element to check, may not be null.
name - The name of the attribute, may not be null or empty.
Returns:
The trimmed value, never empty, will be null if not found or found to be empty.

getUnqualifiedNodeName

public static String getUnqualifiedNodeName(Node node)
Return the node's name without any namespace qualifier

Parameters:
node - Node may not be null
Returns:
The unqualified name

makeXmlName

public static String makeXmlName(String str)
Makes a valid XML name and returns it.

Parameters:
str - the string to make valid, never null.
Returns:
the valid XML name.

findFirstNamedChildNode

public static Node findFirstNamedChildNode(Element parent,
                                           String tag)
Return the first child of the given element with the given tagname. Note that the underlying DOM function allows the special value '*' to match arbitrary tagnames.

Parameters:
parent - Must be an element and must not be null.
tag - Provides the tagname and may not be null.
Returns:
the child if found and null if not found

getAllElementsByName

public static List<Element> getAllElementsByName(Element root,
                                                 String name,
                                                 boolean includeNested)
Retrieves all elements of a certain name that exist under the passed in element. Will include all nested elements of the same name if the flag is set to true.

Parameters:
root - the element under which to locate the specified elements. Cannot be null.
name - the element name, cannot be null or empty.
includeNested - flag indicating that all nested occurrences of the element should be retrieved.
Returns:
a list of all the located nodes, never null, may be empty.

toString

public static String toString(Node node)
Returns the provided document as XML formatted, UTF8 encoded string with indentations.

Parameters:
node - the Node to be returned as string, may be null.
Returns:
the provided document as string, the error message in case of IOExceptions, an empty String if the provided document is null.

getBooleanElementData

public static boolean getBooleanElementData(Element node)
Get the boolean value from the element text data of the specified node. Note: this method only check the values of true and/or 1, which is compliant with W3C. However, this method does not check yes.

Parameters:
node - the Node where the text data resides, may be null or empty.
Returns:
true if the text of the specified node is 1 or true; otherwise return false. It is case insensitive.

getBooleanData

public static boolean getBooleanData(String sValue)
Get the boolean value from the specified string / text. Note: this method only check the values of true and/or 1, which is compliant with W3C. However, this method does not check yes.

Parameters:
sValue - the text data resides, may be null or empty.
Returns:
true if the specified text is 1 or true; otherwise return false. It is case insensitive.

removeStyleSheetPiFromDoc

public static void removeStyleSheetPiFromDoc(Document doc)
Removes the stylesheet processing instruction from the supplied document. If the document is null or if the processing instruction is not found then does nothing.

Parameters:
doc - The Document from which stylesheet processing instruction needs to be removed, may be null.

hasStyleSheetPiInDoc

public static boolean hasStyleSheetPiInDoc(Document doc)
Check the supplied Document for a stylesheet processing instruction.

Parameters:
doc - The Document to check, may be null.
Returns:
true if a stylesheet processing instruction is found, false if not or if the supplied doc is null.
